items.content_html: ua-parser-k8s is a lightweight, Kubernetes-native microservice that provides User-Agent parsing as an API. It utilizes the popular ua-parser-js library to analyze User-Agent strings and extract device, browser, and OS information efficiently.

items.content_html: A lightweight weather application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Stay updated on current weather conditions worldwide with real-time data. The app features a user-friendly interface, allowing users to search for locations effortlessly. It integrates a weather API to provide accurate temperature, humidity, wind speed, and more.
items.title: SasmithaHiram/Weather-366: A lightweight weather application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Stay updated on current weather conditions worldwide with real-time data.
